name: composite-workspaces
description: Contain the entire codebase of the different pieces and applications constituting the project Composite

scripts.generate-core-api-client:local: npm run generate-swagger:local -w core_api && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./core_api/swagger.json -g typescript-fetch -o ./packages/core-api-client/src && npm run build -w @benjaminbours/composite-core-api-client

author: Benjamin Bours
